name: Army Men: Sarge's Heroes 2
description:
Army Men: Sarge's Heroes 2 is the sequel to Army Men: Sarge's Heroes. It was released in 2000 for Game Boy Color, Nintendo 64, PlayStation and PlayStation 2. Unlike the previous game which was more dark in tone, this game has more of a lighthearted storyline.

The Nintendo 64 version was released in a cartridge that was colored green.
